---
title: Research software
---

Links to open-source software produced by members of the CFM Lab can be found below.

## `ucompress.py`
Lightweight Python code for simulating the unconfined compression of
nonlinear poroelastic materials, including fibre-reinforced hydrogels.

```{=html}
<a class="btn btn-outline-dark", href="https://github.com/hennessymatt/ucompress.py" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">
    <i class="bi bi-github" role='img' aria-label='Github'></i> GitHub
</a>
```

## `PoroDropBeam`
Finite element code to simulate the drying of a poroelastic film that is
bonded to the upper surface of a cantilever.

```{=html}
<a class="btn btn-outline-dark", href="https://github.com/hennessymatt/PoroDropBeam" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">
    <i class="bi bi-github" role='img' aria-label='Github'></i> GitHub
</a>
```
